message:
刚刚注册terabox的时候，百度说他们支持以下这些邮箱。然而不支持protomail

TeraBox already supports the following mailboxes:

Gmail
Yahoo
Outlook
AOL
iCloud.com
Inbox.com
Yandex.mail
Mail.ru
DOCOMO
CANDELA
NAVER
Hanmail.net
Nate.com
Rediff.com
sinosnet
TERRA mail
uol mail
rambler.ru
hinet.net
prodigy.net.mx
rawagegypt.com
amet.com.ar
infovia.com.ar
latinmail.com
email.cz
WEB.DE
T-online
Libero-Mail
title: 以前不知道哪些邮箱是比较火的，百度给了我答案
